Brief: HipChat by Atlassian is the ultimate real-time collaboration tool designed to boost productivity amongst coworkers, teammates, and friends. Providing a secure and private platform for messaging and file sharing, HipChat streamlines communication, making it faster than email and more personal than faxing. Teams can effortlessly collaborate on projects and campaigns, enriching their work experience and fostering a robust tech culture.
